title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Picnics
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities     Picnics                Picnics              There are shaded picnic areas located throughout the park. Please be sure to clean up all of your litter and keep our park clean. Picnicking is also welcome on all the beaches but you may want to bring your own shade.                 Popular Picnic Locations Lake Mead     Redstone Roger’s Spring Blue Point Spring Echo Bay Callville Bay Las Vegas Bay Boulder Beach Temple Bar South Cove                    Popular Picnic Locations Lake Mohave        Willow Beach Cottonwood Cove Princess Cove South Arizona Telephone Cove Katherine Landing                    .
